Success

Series

Step 2: Exploring / Information Gathering

You should try to spend 80%

of your time listening and

asking questions and only

20% presenting.

The more you know and understand about the other person, the more effective you will be in meeting and even exceeding their needs.

Questions give you insights

into your customer’s thinking, priorities, values, concerns and desires.

Not to ask questions is to engage in a fatally-flawed game of mind reading.
